parameter.name: contextPath
parameter.description: The context path for the webapp. Defaults to the name of the build final name and then artifact id.

parameter.name: javaSourceDirectory
parameter.description: Root directory for all java files

parameter.name: resinConf
parameter.description: Location of a resin xml configuration file. Optional.

parameter.name: resinDowloadURLTemplate
parameter.description: The resin version that we will download and install.

parameter.name: resinRunMode
parameter.description: What do you want to do with Resin? Must be set to: console | status | start | gui | stop | restart | kill | shutdown | version

parameter.name: resinVersion
parameter.description: The resin version that we will download and install.

parameter.name: runtimeLibDirectory
parameter.description: Root directory for all java files

parameter.name: script
parameter.description: Resin maven plugin is a series of maven scripts.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: If true, execution of the plugin is skipped.

parameter.name: systemPropertiesFile
parameter.description:
File containing system properties to be set before execution
Note that these properties will NOT override System properties that have been set on the command line, by the JVM, or directly in the POM via systemProperties. Optional.

parameter.name: testClassesDirectory
parameter.description: The directory containing generated test classes.

parameter.name: tmpDirectory
parameter.description: The temporary directory to use for the webapp. Defaults to target/resin-tmp

parameter.name: webAppSourceDirectory
parameter.description: Root directory for all html/jsp etc files

parameter.name: webDefaultXml
parameter.description: A webdefault.xml file to use instead of the default for the webapp. Optional.

parameter.name: webXml
parameter.description: The location of the web.xml file. If not set then it is assumed it is in ${basedir}/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF

parameter.description: The context path for the webapp. Defaults to the name of the build final name and then artifact id.

parameter.description: A webdefault.xml file to use instead of the default for the webapp. Optional.

parameter.name: webXml
parameter.description: The location of the web.xml file. If not set then it is assumed it is in ${basedir}/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF

parameter.name: contextPath
parameter.description: The context path for the webapp. Defaults to the name of the build final name and then artifact id.

parameter.name: javaSourceDirectory
parameter.description: Root directory for all java files

parameter.name: resinConf
parameter.description: Location of a resin xml configuration file. Optional.

parameter.name: resinDowloadURLTemplate
parameter.description: The resin version that we will download and install.

parameter.name: resinRunMode
parameter.description: What do you want to do with Resin? Must be set to: console | status | start | gui | stop | restart | kill | shutdown | version

parameter.name: resinVersion
parameter.description: The resin version that we will download and install.

parameter.name: runtimeLibDirectory
parameter.description: Root directory for all java files

parameter.name: script
parameter.description: Resin maven plugin is a series of maven scripts.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: If true, execution of the plugin is skipped.

parameter.name: systemPropertiesFile
parameter.description:
File containing system properties to be set before execution
Note that these properties will NOT override System properties that have been set on the command line, by the JVM, or directly in the POM via systemProperties. Optional.

parameter.name: testClassesDirectory
parameter.description: The directory containing generated test classes.

parameter.name: tmpDirectory
parameter.description: The temporary directory to use for the webapp. Defaults to target/resin-tmp
